ProjectTitle: Covalent chiral functionalization of graphite for enantioselective separation

Storage: if you use a KU Leuven storage solution automatic backups and a mirror will be made, you don't have to make separate backups on hard drives, for more information and to compare different storage solutions see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Preservation/Sharing: Since you don't mention factors restricting sharing, consider using a data repository to share and preserve your data, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
